Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-3360 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-3360 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.71.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.71.0-5, affected by CVE-2025-3360
